channel.title: Php Server Women War Video Insane Juggling Aim Broox on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Php Server Women War Video Insane Juggling Aim Broox on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: stupid howard stern
item.description: So today.. I was watching cky4 hanging out with mark and matt.. waiting to goto juggling club.. and as soon as we should have left for juggling club.. I got a call from derek exclaiming that my server wasn’t responding. so I immediately called my lovely colo facility and mentioned to them that I needed my server rebooted. so they rebooted it.. and it came back up.. the women I was talking to mentioned that I was receiving an insane amount of traffic on port 80 from a huge number of ips.
